oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Efficacy of Intramammary Tilmicosin at Drying-off, and Other Risk Factors, for Prevention of New Intramammary Infections during the Dry Period
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Dingwell, R. T.
Duffield, T. F.
Leslie, E.
Keefe, G. P.
DesCÃ´teaux, L.
Kelton, D. F.
Lissemore, K. D.

oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: intramammary infusion
tilmicosin phosphate
placebo
intramammary infections
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This study compared the efficacy of an intramammary infusion containing tilmicosin phosphate to an infusion of a negative-control intramammary placebo for preventing new intramammary infections (IMI) during the dry period.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 2002; 269
